Buttons for the presets, stick for setting and adjusting the presets–a failsafe here would be to use one button (say, the trigger) for “use stick” with presets for sure, and then manual up/down for adjustments.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWe use Xbox 360 controllers, and in 2019 we used the x, b, a buttons for high, mid, low goal and we used the
